title: ZIMURA executive director Polisile Ncube-Chimhini steps down
desc: Zimbabwe Music Rights Association (ZIMURA) executive director Polisile Ncube-Chimhini has stepped down with immediate effect, bringing to an end a tenure that spanned more than three decades at the organisation.

title: “It’s hard to find an Apple product without an Israeli touch”
desc: Apple Israel manager Rony Friedman says local teams are embedded in chips, cameras, modems, and AI at the heart of the company’s devices.

title: Roan leaves agency after Ghislaine Maxwell emails
desc: Pop star Chappell Roan says she is no longer represented by Wasserman, the talent agency led by Casey Wasserman, after renewed scrutiny of email exchanges between him and Ghislaine Maxwell.
